songs.title: My Life
songs.lyrics:
What? What?
My life on the line
I put my life on the line
I put my life on the line
I put my life in these streets
Every day hustle hard nigga
Trying to get rich
I put my life for this
If I don’t get it right now
I don’t take no shit

All my niggas bleed the pops
So no rubber bands can pop
And those hoes can’t block

Yeah I put my
Life in this shit
Every day hustle hard
A nigga trying to get rich

Tell the  DJ turn me up
Im rocking this shit
Remind me of back in the day
Of the rocks they seen bricks
Thirty six ohs
1008 rounds
I serve a nigga great
I serve a nigga great
But quit me
Cause you  know that I got it
Put my life in this shit
Better get it how you can
Trying not to get caught
By them boys they looking like you
Cause they found out that it wasn’t you
Them niggas is cops
I wasn’t worried
I got away
But I lost my ride
Then the trip came back up
From the mess
You can’t connect
No shorty
I hit the club
I see you around 12
Make the drop
Hit the club
Count the the heads
And talk biddies
It’s all love
When you doing this shit
It’s all good

Every day hustle hard nigga
Trying to get rich
When I put my life for this
If I don’t get it right now
I don’t take no shit

All my niggas bleed the backs
So those rubber bands can pop
And them hoes can block
Yeah I put my life in this shit
Every day hustle hard nigga
Trying to get rich

Check it
I put my life in this shit
Seems oxymoronic
Like a dyke on the dick
On the wall Mike Jack
Live my life on a trip
A heartless serial killer
Talking righteous and shit

Look I put my life in this shit
My talents and my lyrics
Keep the rights to the shit
Talent bounced up down
Nigga striking it rich
The airwaves on fire
Now they hyping this shit
Celebrity gift from God
I’m only human
I’m still real
Lacking in cruise control
When I’m pumping
That kill Bill
Off the ignorant shit
But I go and I still will
Oh if you didn’t know
This is how being ill feel
Forever 100
And I never
Have to prove it
I clinically infused and it spews
From the music
But your flaws in magazines
While you typing this shit
I started circa ‘86 and put my life in this shit
Nigga
What

I put my life in this shit
Every day hustle hard nigga
Trying to get rich
When I put my life for this
If I don’t get it right now
I won’t take no shit

All my niggas bleed the pops
So no rubber bands can pop
And those hoes can’t block

Right yeah
Me  I put my life in this shit
Every day hustle hard nigga
Trying to get rich

You didn’t see it but it really happened
HARD
Them niggas bowing while you really acting
FACTS
Pull up on you in this automatic
GLOCK
Closed curtains get that boy a casket

Check  my resume
You pussy niggas never say it
I’m thinking real estate
And mansions in the Palisades
You niggas counterfeit
Gangstas know
He not a chick
NAH
I watch the money clip
Like genders in Olympians
I’m feeling arrogant
The hoes ain’t saving up nah
BG 2  C’s in your residence
HOLD UP NIGGA


Maybe I put my life on this
I ain’t wishing on a star
I was born with this
Been a soldier
Been a coder
Now I’m making you sick
We ain’t talking about old sweat sounds
And bricks
Skeet mask for the cash
Nigga lay down quick
Click clack
Bap pow
Let the hook begin nigga

Yeah
I put my
Life in this shit
Every day hustle hard
A nigga trying to get rich
Yeah I put my life on this
If I don’t get it right now
I won’t take no shit

All my niggas bleed the pops
So no rubber bands can pop
And those hoes can’t block

YEAH
I put my life in this shit
Every day hustle hard
Nigga trying to get rich
